#Text=Russia 's Defence Ministry spokesman denied the report , saying that  Russian peacekeepers have been given no orders to move to these populated areas , " .

column1: #Text=There have also been reports of Russian helicopters setting fire to Georgian National Park near Borzhomi .

#Text=The Russian Defence Ministry 's spokesman expressed his surprise and declared that Russian troops were ready to provide assistance in extinguishing the fire if Georgia made an official request .
#Text=" It is understandable to us that the Georgian authorities are ready to blame the Russian side for any natural disasters on the territory of Georgia , " he said .
#Text=Russian troops are still occupying the key towns of Gori , north of Tbilisi , and Senako in the west of Georgia .
#Text=Far from pulling out , Russian military units are entrenching themselves in new positions deeper into Georgia , according to Daily Telegraph .

#Text=They have also blown up a strategic Georgian Kaspi railway bridge on the main line connecting the country to its neighbours , essentially severing the last route for freight and trade after Russian soldiers also took control of the Georgian main east-west highway .
